translations: v.保护，维护；保持，维持；腌制，保存（食物）；禁止他人捕猎
n.果酱，腌菜；（某人或某个团体的）专属领域，独有活动；动物保护区，外人禁入的猎地

sentences.sentence: We need to preserve the forest.
We will do everything to preserve peace.
sentences.translation: 我们将竭尽全力维护和平。

sentences.sentence: Efforts to preserve the peace have failed.
sentences.translation: 维护和平的努力失败了。
